title: Individual Consultations | Wellness Center | University of Illinois at Chicago

Wellness Center     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Wellness Center      Wellness Center   Main Menu    About Us           Need Help?    FAQs    Contact         News & Events           Calendar of Events    Annual Events    Past Events         Resources & Services           Pop-Up Pantry    Individual Consultations    Homeless Assistance    Wellness Supplies    Stress Relief Place    Sexual Health/ Healthy Relationships    Literature Library & Videos    Alcohol & e-CHUG    Studying    Conflict Management    Sleep         Workshops           Workshops Offered    Request a Workshop         Policies           Alcohol and Other Drug    Smoke Free Campus Policy and Fine Payment    Student Disciplinary Policy    Cannabis Policy          Eyebrow menu    UIC Connection    Student Affairs    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                              Wellness Center       Individual Consultations      View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Wellness Center    Resources & Services    Individual Consultations        Individual Wellness Consultations  Consultations with a health educator are available during office hours by appointment.  Staff can provide consultation and referrals for topics including: stress management, smoking cessation, responsible drinking, sexual well-being, general nutrition, safety and more. Fill out a request form to schedule a consultation.  On average, consultations are a one-time basis lasting for 30-45min.   Individual consultations are intended for Wellness concerns, consultations are not intended for clinical counseling.  If you are experiencing a crisis or emergency and require services outside of business hours please call 911.  The Wellness Center is not a walk-in clinic, if you have a physical medical concern, we recommend contacting your primary care physician.  If you are attempting to seek on-going counseling for depression, anxiety or any other concern, please contact the UIC Counseling Center .  The UIC Counseling Center is confidential and free to all registered UIC students. Click the link below for information on the Counseling Center.  All University employees, except staff in the Campus Advocacy Network (CAN) and the Counseling Center who provide advocacy or counseling services, have a duty to report any incidents involving sexual misconduct. Refer to a description of Responsible Employee. For more information visit: https://sexualmisconduct.uic.edu/policy/campus-roles-responsibilities/  Unless otherwise informed by a Wellness Center staff member, you will hear back from Wellness Center staff within 48-72 hours of your initial request. Please note that due to unpredictable events appointments might need to be rescheduled.          Instructions      UIC Counseling Center Information and Emergency Support Services        Individual Wellness Consultation   Disclaimer * Required   I Understand  I have read the above information about individual consultations and the other resources before submitting this form. I understand that my request is for a Health and Wellness concern only and that I am requesting to meet with a health educator for a one-time meeting. Wellness Consultation Form * Required College Transition Home Sickness Making a Friend Nutrition Guidance (As a Lifestyle) Report a Rape (*Wellness Center Staff are Mandatory Reporters) Responsible Drinking Request Access to Food Request Help to Access Housing Safe Sex Sleep Deprevation Smoking Cessation Stress Managment Street Safety Study Skills First and Last Name * Required UIC Email Address * Required Phone Number * Required CAPTCHA Name This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.
